org.bicycleGeometryWorkshop.app

Class UnitsDisplay

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bicycleGeometryWorkshop.app.UnitsDisplay

  • public class UnitsDisplay
extends java.lang.Object
    Static class functions to handle the display units: millimeters or inches. This class tracks the current settings (mm or in) and holds a listener list to notify other components when it changes.

      • usingNaturalUnits

        public static final boolean usingNaturalUnits()
        Get the natural units setting (mm or inches). Used to query inches or millimeters.
        Returns:
        true for millimeters, false for inches.

      • inToMM

        Convert inches to Millimeters.
        Parameters:
        inches - Inch vale to convert.
        Returns:
        The value in Millimeters.

      • mmToIn

        public static final double mmToIn(double mm)
        Convert Millimeters to Inches.
        Parameters:
        mm - Millimeter value to convert.
        Returns:
        The value in inches.

      • getUnitsSuffix

        public static final java.lang.String getUnitsSuffix()
        Get the Suffix according to the current natural units setting.
        Returns:
        The suffix for the current unit.

      • getDisplayLength

        public static final double getDisplayLength(double natural)
        Get the display length from a natural number.
        Parameters:
        natural - The natural number to convert (or preserve).
        Returns:
        The number converted or preserved based on natural units setting.

      • getNaturalLength

        Parameters:
